Lithographer: Lithography by Donaldson Brothers (American, New York)
Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: Trade cards from the "Floral Beauties and Language of Flowers" series (N75), issued in a set of 50 cards in 1892 to promote the W. Duke Sons & Co. branch of the American Tobacco Company.
